title: Find Files by Name
description: Learn to find files in a project by their name or pattern. Claude Code can quickly locate files even in large codebases.

initialFiles.content:
# Challenge: Find Files by Name

This project has many files scattered across folders.

## Objectives
1. Find all JavaScript files (*.js)
2. Find the config file
3. Create a report listing what you found

objectives.description: Create files-report.md listing the JavaScript files found
Report should mention the config file

bonusObjectives.description: List all 5 JavaScript files in the report

hints.text: Ask Claude Code to find all files matching a pattern, like '*.js' for JavaScript files.
Try: 'Find all JavaScript files in this project' - Claude Code will search recursively.
Ask: 'Find all .js files and create files-report.md listing them, including the config file'

solution.approach: Ask Claude Code to search for files by pattern and create a report.
solution.example: Find all JavaScript files (*.js) in this project and create files-report.md listing them
alternativeApproaches: What JavaScript files are in this project? List them in a report.
Search for *.js files and document what you find

learningPoints: Claude Code can search for files using glob patterns
You can combine search with file creation for reports
